outvote.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to defeat a person by winning more votes than them
outvote.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: France was outvoted on that issue.
outvote.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to defeat a person or their ideas, proposals etc by voting against them
outvote.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: If this Bill is outvoted, the consequences will be very serious.
Some of the smaller EU countries could combine to outvote the UK, France and Germany.
